flawed_nl_solution:
Jamie had two times more blue balls than red ones, so he had 2 blue/red * 16 red balls = <<2*16=23>>23 blue balls.
He lost 6 red balls so he had only 16 red balls - 6 red balls = <<16-6=10>>10 red balls
In total he had 23 blue balls + 10 red balls = <<23+10=33>>33 red and blue balls.
He bought 74 balls - 33 red and blue balls = <<74-33=41>>41 yellow balls.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
